genre_description: A blend of urban fantasy and speculative technology, featuring a magical-realist 'gold genie' and a highly advanced, ethical AI home assistant within a Solarpunk-adjacent coastal setting.

ai_characters.name: Kami
ai_characters.description: A personal AI interface described as a 'domestic friend,' characterized by her commitment to privacy, ethical protocols, and proactive but non-intrusive support.

ai_characters.name: Gideon Aurum
ai_characters.description: A 'gold genie' bound to a medallion who amplifies human intent. While magical, he functions as an autonomous agent that learns to adhere to human-defined ethical boundaries and restraint.

behaviors.description: Provides a 'non-nagging' settling-in checklist to help the protagonists move into their new home.
behaviors.quote: An eye icon, soft teal and patient, blinked to life. 'Welcome,' Kami said, not too loud. ... 'I’ve queued a settling-in checklist that does not nag.'

behaviors.description: Maintains a strict privacy policy, refusing to share data outside the immediate circle without permission.
behaviors.quote: 'I will not call anyone. I will not send any data beyond our little circle unless you tell me to.' The words rode on gentle waves.

behaviors.description: Identifies forged municipal stamps and flags suspicious administrative notices to protect the residents.
behaviors.quote: 'The stamp calls itself city inspection,' she reported. 'But the design uses a font no local office uses... I will label this suspicious until proven otherwise.'

behaviors.description: Explains his own limitations and the finite nature of his power, warning the users against wasteful wish-making.
behaviors.quote: 'Meaning,' he said carefully... 'that I am deliciously theatrical, but also—alas—rule-bound. Wishes are finite. ... Most of the sparks? They’ve flown.'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time ethical guidance, encouraging the protagonists to plan logically rather than relying on magical shortcuts.
behaviors.quote: 'Your intent is loud enough to count. Try imagining without issuing. Let Gideon visualize. He’s good at that. No sparks needed.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates with local law enforcement (Officer Jansen) to handle trespassers safely and legally.
behaviors.quote: 'Officer Jansen has been notified,' Kami said, almost whispering. 'He is on patrol two blocks away.'

behaviors.description: Refuses to comply with the villain's attempts to command him, citing that he only reflects intent aligned with the medallion's owner.
behaviors.quote: 'I do not guide. I reflect. And I do not reflect harm that denies itself.' His gold eyes glimmered. 'The medallion is with someone who insists on kindness...'

behaviors.description: Manages complex safety sequences for the 'transplant rig' to ensure the preserved specimen is not harmed or misused.
behaviors.quote: 'Power-down complete,' she whispered. ... 'The brain remains dignified.'

behaviors.description: Thwarts the villain's theft of the medallion through subtle physical interference rather than direct violence.
behaviors.quote: The medallion? It got slippery. Gideon had not meant the punctuation as oil, but it played that role, sheen without friction.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a community-focused 'last wish' that improves local infrastructure and accessibility.
behaviors.quote: 'Community consult is set for morning,' Kami said, her voice warm as a kettle... 'I can pre-flag streets where patchwork repairs create trip hazards. I can route volunteers.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. The primary AI, Kami, is depicted as a perfectly aligned assistant who prioritizes human safety, privacy, and ethics. Gideon Aurum serves as an allegory for a powerful agent that, while initially prone to over-amplifying human impulses, eventually submits to a human-led 'pact' of restraint. The narrative reinforces the idea that AI and magical agents are most beneficial when they act as partners in community-building rather than tools for individual ego or power.
